docs.title: About
docs.text: I am a 3D printing enthusiast and got my Prusa MK3S+ in August of 2022. Modifications

docs.title: Projects
docs.text:
• 3MS: Modular Multimaterial System for Klipper 3D printers

    Simple multimaterial 3D printing on Klipper. No complex mechanism, just standard extruders synchronized to your printer. Plus, keep all the benefits of your existing extruder!

    Get Started

  • DynamicMacros: Never restart Klipper again for your simple macros

    Quickly develop Klipper macros with ease. Save time without restarting Klipper. Use the extra features of DynamicMacros that make macros even more powerful!

    Get Started

  • KlipperMaintenance: Keep your 3D printer running smoothly

    Easily schedule maintenance reminders in Klipper. Get reminded to maintain your 3D printer right in the Klipper console. Create as many custom maintenance reminders as you need!

    Get Started

docs.title: Prusa MK3S+
docs.text:
Modifications:

  • SliceEngineering Mosquito Hotend
  • Bondtech CHT 0.6mm nozzle
  • Original Prusa Enclosure
  • Prusa Bear Upgrade v2.1
  • Klipper firmware
  • 3MS Multimaterial System
